group_1.textRight: Why did you follow me to Ui's room?

group_1.textLeft: I could ask that of you! It's not YOUR room!

group_1.textRight: I came here with Ui because I promised her@I'd think of a game she and I could play.

group_1.textLeft: But I promised her I was gonna come up@with a game for her and me, too!

group_1.textRight: I'm pretty sure I said I wanted to play@a game with all three of us, though...

group_1.textLeft: Oh my...you're all so lively now that@school's out!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* That's right.

group_1.textLeft: I'm going to say hello to the doctor.
Can you come with me, Iroha?

group_1.textRight: Sure thing.

group_1.textLeft: Ui, we're going to step out for a bit,@but we'll be back soon.

group_1.textRight: Ah, okay!

group_1.textLeft: Ui and I are going to play together,@so you better leave too, Nemu!

group_1.textRight: You can't tell me what to do.

group_1.textLeft: If you really want to engage in this confabulation,@bring it! I can do this all day!

group_1.textRight: Hmph. For a genius, you sure have a lot of@free time.

group_1.textLeft: What's that supposed to mean?!

group_1.textRight: Um, guys, what's a..."con-fab-u-lation?"

group_1.textLeft: It's when people talk about their opinions@on a specific issue.

group_1.textRight: Talk about... [chara:101502:lipSynch_0][chara:101502:motion_100][wait:0.8][chara:101502:cheek_0][chara:101502:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:101502:lipSynch_1]That's it!

group_1.textLeft: Hm?

group_1.textRight: Let's talk about what we want to do@for the Christmas party!

group_1.textLeft: What for?

group_1.textRight: The teacher said we're going to have a@class discussion...
...about what we want to do for the@Christmas party, remember?

group_1.textLeft: Did she?

group_1.textRight: Since you guys are so smart,
I bet you can come up with something super@fun that I could never even dream of!

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, yeah, of course I can!

group_1.textRight: I knew it!
What about you, Nemu?
If you talk to the class about what you'd@like to do,
I just know all of us in class would be@so happy!

group_1.textLeft: If this discussion of yours...
...is meant to revolve around the feelings of@the other students, then I have nothing to say.

group_1.textRight: But...

group_1.textLeft: Welp, she's giving us the silent treatment@again.

group_1.textRight: I-I'm really sorry, Nemu!
This is the very first Christmas party@I'll get to spend with my friends,
so I just want to make it as fun as possible...
I thought the three of us could come up with@lots of ideas together...

group_1.textLeft: ...In that case, you and I can brainstorm@together.
Hey! Ui said "the three of us!"@You can't hog her all to yourself!

group_1.textRight: We're backâ€“@[chara:100102:lipSynch_0][chara:100102:motion_100][wait:0.8][chara:100102:cheek_0][chara:100102:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100102:lipSynch_1]Oh, no, this again?

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* They seem very close.
We're not close! I don't like Nemu one bit!

group_1.textRight: ...Hmph.
